Text: While uploading is greatly appreciated is it really necessary to watermark every frame of the show?  If you feel that you must give yourself credit for the rip, the upload, whatever then how about just a mention at the beginning or ending.  It is mildly annoying to stare at your http://buhaypirata.net for two hours.
